text:
Huge casino, with entertainment for all. Physical PP is must and entry is free for all foreigners. Photography is prohibited, one should not even attempt, if caught they will ask for the camera and delete them.
Minimum stake in roulette is SG$4. Poker, Blackjack, Slots, Roulette, Baccarat, Craps, Keno, Bingo are the games available here in 2 casinos in more than 500 tables. ..24Ã—7 All days.

Well, it's a lot of fun to play those games.. people standing there aren't pushy, quite easy going but of course...just know that you're just there to have fun...you aren't really going to win much..just to pull you in they'll make you win the first two times

Bar located on casino level, nice if you want to watch people in the casino, nice live music but bit loud directly next to the stage, cocktails are okayish (a lot of ice), they have a dress code but they don't care about. Chinese dream land I guess.
If you have only Kosovo passport, you can't enter in this place, because does not recognise Kosovo Passport.
